resources.string: Congratulations! All levels finished. Skipping to level 1.
- Goal: push all apples to the designated white-outlined target areas. \n- An apple can only be pushed in moving direction. \n- Only one apple at a time can be pushed.

- When accelerometer is enabled, tilt the device to move. 
- Level the device to stop movement. 
- Alternatively, swipe anywhere on screen in the direction where to move. 
- Movement will continue when finger is not lifted at the end of a swipe. 
- Or, tap game square to move horizontally or vertically to that position. 
- Tap lower-left corner of screen for a context menu.
